# didChangeNotification

**Type Property**

A notification that posts when the value of the locked state for a scene changes.

## Declaration

```swift
nonisolated class let didChangeNotification: NSNotification.Name
```

## Discussion

This notification is sent when the value in the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPointerLockState/isLocked] property changes. The `userInfo` dictionary of the notification contains the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPointerLockState/sceneUserInfoKey] key, which reflects the new value of the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPointerLockState/isLocked] property.

## Updating the Lock State

- **sceneUserInfoKey**: A key that reflects the new locked state.
